thread.title: "Good morning", Rama shares stunning views of Valbona - Telegraph
thread.title_full: "Good morning", Rama shares stunning views of Valbona - Telegraph

author: Jehona Hulaj
title: "Good morning", Rama shares stunning views of Valbona - Telegraph
text:
"Good morning", Rama shares stunning views of Valbona
The Prime Minister of Albania, Edi Rama, started today with a greeting to citizens via social media.
He shared a warm message, accompanied by beautiful views of Valbona, one of Albania's most popular mountain and tourist destinations.
In his post, Rama writes: "GOOD MORNING and with the stunning beauty of Valbona, I wish you a good day."
The Prime Minister's post comes as a promotion of domestic tourism and appreciation of Albanian nature, highlighting the importance of natural resources for citizens and visitors. /Telegraph/
